Color Palette

Pacific (Blue)

Usage:

  • Primary Actions (CTA buttons, links, etc.)
  • Primary Accent (Navigation Bars, Headers, App Bars)

Sierra (Dark Grey)

Usage:

  • Primary Body Text

Ridge (Off White)

Usage:

  • Background

Havasu (Pale Blue)

Usage:

  • Background

Yosemite (Green)

Usage:

  • Cart Actions
  • Cart Actions
  • Success

Helen (Red)

Usage:

  • Error
  • Alert
  • Void Buttons
  • Delete
  • Remove

Malibu (Yellow)

Usage:

  • Warnings

Catalina (Purple/Razzmatazz)

Usage:

  • Resale (Icons, Seats)
